Mabel Gladys Goldberg

  1. Foster Name:
  2. Foster Family: J. E. Street
  3. Location of Family: Crab Orchard, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Sterling, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 4
  7. Date of Birth: 1903, NY
  8. Gender: female
  9. Married Name: Mabel Patten
  10. Spouse Name: Patten
  11. Source: Sterling Sun, 9 October 1908.; 1920 United States Federal Census; National Orphan Train Complex; 1910 United States Federal Census; Omaha World-Herald, 27 December 1979.
